price: او هغوى چې له الله پرته نور څه رابلي، هغه هېڅ نه پيدا كوي بلكې خپله مخلوق دي.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَخۡلُقُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yadʿūna min dūni al-lahi lā yakhluqūna shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
